name: ZOMBALL
summary: In ZOMBALL you play as a survivor in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. (it's super kid friendly as no guns) Instead of using guns or other weapons, you must use your athletic skills to defend yourself by throwing various sports balls at the approaching zombies.  You can be a lethal PITCHER or QUARTERBACK. The game is fast-paced and action-packed, requiring quick reflexes and good aim to take down the zombies before they get too close. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter...
